src:
Marahi Kapolres, Gubernur Kalteng Tak Terima Ditegur Lempar Botol ke Stadion
02 Nov 2019, 15:40 by Audrey Santoso, Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Video Gubernur Kalimantan Tengah (Kalteng) Sugianto Sabran memarahi Kapolres Palangka Raya AKBP Timbul RK Siregar saat laga Kalteng Putra FC versus Persib Bandung viral di media sosial. Sugianto marah lantaran tak terima ditegur soal lemparan botol ke dalam stadion.
Pertandingan Kalteng FC versus Persib Bandung digelar di Stadion Tuah Pahoe, Jalan Tjilik Riwut, Palangka Raya, Jumat (1/11/2019). Jumlah penonton di stadion tersebut kurang-lebih 4.500 orang.
Saat laga berlangsung, salah seorang pemain Kalteng Putra diganjar kartu merah. Tak berselang lama kemudian ada lemparan botol yang datang dari arah tribun VVIP sebanyak dua kali.
Dalam rekaman video yang viral, Sugianto Sabran tampak melakukan pelemparan botol. Sugianto memakai baju warna oranye dan topi berwarna hitam.
Sugianto juga sesekali menunjuk-nunjuk ke arah stadion. Sugianto tampak marah-marah.
text:
Marahi Kapolres, Central Kalimantan Governor Not Accept Being Rebuked Throwing Bottles at the Stadium
02 Nov 2019, 15:40 by Audrey Santoso, Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Video of Central Kalimantan Governor (Central Kalimantan) Sugianto Sabran berated the Palangka Raya Police Chief AKBP Arise RK Siregar during the Kalteng Putra FC match versus Persib Bandung viral on social media. Sugianto was angry because he did not receive reprimand about the throwing of the bottle into the stadium.
Kalteng FC match versus Persib Bandung was held at Tuah Pahoe Stadium, Jalan Tjilik Riwut, Palangka Raya, Friday (11/01/2019). The number of spectators in the stadium is approximately 4,500 people.
When the match took place, one of the Kalteng Putra players was given a red card. Not long afterwards there were bottle tosss coming from the direction of the VVIP stand twice.
In a viral video recording, Sugianto Sabran appeared to throw a bottle. Sugianto wears an orange shirt and a black hat.
Sugianto also pointed at the stadium occasionally. Sugianto looked angry.
